column4: Hi today I found the amazing beep command to play a song with given frequencies.because university pc's dont have speakers is there any way that I can listen normal audio (like a music or the system audio) through internal speaker?
Not with anything close to reasonable quality, no.
Think back to the days of DOS and the audio from those games. That's the best you can get, and you won't get results that good from trying to converting normal audio files.
Yes, it's technically possible. Almost certainly not worth doing though :)
